titles.title: To extend the declaration of nonnavigability in perpetuity for Rivercenter, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
To extend the declaration of nonnavigability in perpetuity for Rivercenter, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1988 to provide that the declaration of nonnavigability for the Rivercenter portion of the Delaware River, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, shall not expire (currently the declaration of nonnavigability for that area expires on November 17, 2018).
